content.title: Mukhyamantri Krishi Utpadan Sanrakshan Yojana
content.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Himachal Pradesh
content.details: The scheme 'Mukhyamantri Krishi Utpadan Sanrakshan Yojana' was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Government of Himachal Pradesh by merging three ongoing protection based Departmental schemes namely Sour Badhbandi, Anti-Hail Net Structure & Green House Renovation Scheme into a single scheme having a common objective.
benefits: Sour Badhbandi (Solar Fencing): Under this scheme, a subsidy of 85% is being provided if three or more farmers opt to install solar fencing, and if farmers opt to install solar fencing on individual land then an 80% subsidy is being provided.
Anti-Hail Net Structure: Financial assistance maximum of up to 80% is being provided to the eligible farmer for an area coverage maximum of up to 5000 Square Meters.

Green House Renovation Scheme: Under this scheme, 70% assistance is being provided to the farmers for the replacement of poly sheets after 5 years of setting up of polyhouse or damage due to natural calamities.
eligibility: The beneficiary should be a permanent resident of Himachal Pradesh.
All the farmers of the state of Himachal Pradesh.
Priority will be given to small and marginal farmers for giving benefits of the scheme.

faqs.question: What are the three component of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The three components of the scheme are Sour Badhbandi (Solar Fencing), Anti-Hail Net Structure & Green House Renovation Scheme.

faqs.question: By which department was this scheme launched?
faqs.answer: Department of Agriculture, Government of Himachal Pradesh.

faqs.question: Who is eligible under this scheme?
faqs.answer: All the farmers who are permanent residents of Himachal Pradesh are eligible to apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme 'Sour Badhbandi (Solar Fencing)'?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, a subsidy of 85% is being provided if three or more farmers opt to install solar fencing, and if farmers opt to install solar fencing on individual land then an 80% subsidy is being provided.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme 'Anti-Hail Net Structure'?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, a financial assistance maximum of up to 80% is being provided to the eligible farmer for an area coverage maximum of up to 5000 Square Meters.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme 'Green House Renovation Scheme'?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, 70% assistance is being provided to the farmers for the replacement of poly sheets after 5 years of setting up of polyhouse or damage due to natural calamities.

faqs.question: How can I apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The beneficiary may apply online mode.
